Paragraph: As shown in Figure 2 , the maximum absorption peak of PQCDTB ( λ max ) was observed at 389 and 539 nm , respectively , in solution ( 10^-6 M in chloroform ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. λ max (wavelength of maximum absorption peak)
2. 10^-6 M (concentration of PQCDTB in chloroform)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. λ max (wavelength of maximum absorption peak)

The concentration of PQCDTB in chloroform (10^-6 M) is not a material property, but rather a condition under which the material was tested. Therefore, it is not relevant to the material property entities.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid entity in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| λ max |
